name: Pasaana_Farmer
content:
Pasaana Farmer was a Male Aki-Aki who lived in the Pasaana Plains. He was the owner of the speeder bikes that Finn, Rey Skywalker, Poe Dameron, Chewbacca, C-3PO and BB-8 destroyed during the battle with the First Order during the Festival of the Ancestors. He asked that Rey get him parts to fix his speeders in Mos Eisley, the Jundland Wastes, and Tuanul Village .
"Pasaana Farmer" first appeared in a side-mission titled "Sifting on Pasaana Nights" in the 2022 non-canonical video game LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga.
